Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?

I have progressive skin changes on my neck and arms that started around puberty, with numerous non-tender, yellow papules that form into net-like plaques on the back of my neck and inner parts of my elbows.
Do you have any known medical conditions such as diabetes or lipid disorders?
No, I have no personal or family history of skin conditions and am otherwise healthy.
Has anyone else in your family had similar skin symptoms?
No, there is no family history of skin conditions.
Final Diagnosis: Pseudoxanthoma elasticum.
